title.value: Vegetable pea initial material creation with the determinant stem growth type based on flat seed lupine form
Создание исходного материала овощного гороха с детерминантным типом роста стебля на основе гладкосеменной люпиноидной формы

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Borbut, E.M., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Minsk Regional Agricultural Experimental Station

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was realized a creation of highly technological and yielding initial material of green pea (Pisum sativum L.) on the basis of smooth-seeded lupin-like form. In course of the study there were selected perspective determinant samples with high indexes of product quality. A new vegetable pea hybrid material is created, a character of lupine form inheritance is shown, an interrelation of quantitative features is determined that allows to make a selection of valuable morphotypes more effectively. Research results showed that the obtained F1 hybrids created on the basis of smooth-seeded lupin-like sample Lu-268/99 in accordance to the majority of productivity elements exceeded not only the average values of parents, but in average by combinations exceeded the indexes of the best one from 5.2% (weight of seeds of a bean) up to 103.6% (seed yield). The lupin-like form of stalk crumpled form of seeds was controlled by recessive genes that made it possible to realize selection of valuable genotypes at early stages of breeding process.
